title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2000.1 - General purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2000.1 - General purposes

State Regulations

The purposes of the corporation are: (a) to improve post-secondary educational
opportunities of eligible students through centralized administration of New

York State financial aid and loan programs; and
(b) to coordinate the State's administrative
effort in student financial aid and loan programs with those of other levels of
government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
